org.drip.analytics.period
Class CouponPeriod

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.analytics.period.Period
          org.drip.analytics.period.CouponPeriod

public class CouponPeriod
extends Period

This class extends the period class with a few day-count specific parameters such as: frequency, reset date, and accrual day-count convention.

Constructs a CouponPeriod instance from the specified dates

Parameters:
dblStart - Period Start Date
dblEnd - Period End Date
dblAccrualStart - Period Accrual Start Date
dblAccrualEnd - Period Accrual End Date
dblPay - Period Pay Date
dblReset - Period Reset Date
iFreq - Frequency
strCouponDC - Coupon day count
bApplyCpnEOMAdj - Apply end-of-month adjustment to the coupon periods
strAccrualDC - Accrual Day count
bApplyAccEOMAdj - Apply end-of-month adjustment to the accrual periods
dblMaturity - Maturity date
strCalendar - Holiday Calendar
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the inputs are invalid

bApplyAccEOMAdj - Apply end-of-month adjustment to the accrual periods
bFullStub - True - generates full first stub
strCalendar - Optional Holiday Calendar for accrual

List of coupon Periods
